articles.author: Sharjah 24
articles.title: Lebanese rejoice after Mayyas win 'America's Got Talent' - Sharjah24
articles.description: Sharjah24 – AFP: Lebanese celebrated the local dance troupe Mayyas on Thursday after it won the "America's Got Talent" TV contest, stoking joy and pride in a country battered by years of political and economic turmoil.
articles.content: Many fans, across age groups and religious lines in the crisis-tested country and its large diaspora, tearfully cheered the all-women group for what judges and viewers hailed as a hypnotic and mesmer… [+602 chars]

articles.author: Tucker Reals, Melissa Quinn, Aimee Picchi
articles.title: "A big win for America": Biden announces tentative deal to avert national rail strike - CBS News
articles.description: Labor Secretary Marty Walsh says the deal "balances the needs of workers, businesses, and our nation's economy."
articles.content: President Biden announced early Thursday morning that days of negotiations at the U.S. Department of Labor to avert a national rail strike, with potentially major implications for the economy, had yi… [+6309 chars]

articles.title: Discovery of extinct prehistoric reptile that lived among dinosaurs - Science Daily
articles.description: Researchers have discovered a new extinct species of lizard-like reptile that belongs to the same ancient lineage as New Zealand's living tuatara. A team of scientists describe the new species Opisthiamimus gregori, which once inhabited Jurassic North America…
